import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { Link, useParams } from "react-router-dom"; import { ContactServices } from "../../Services/ContactServices"; const ViewContact = () => { let{contactId}=useParams() let [state,setState] = useState({ loading:false, contact:{}, errorMessage:"" }) useEffect(()=>{ let prom = new Promise((res1,rej1)=>{ setState({...state,loading:true}) let response = ContactServices.getContact(contactId) res1(response) rej1() }) prom },[contactId]) return (
{/* SECTION-1 */}

View Contact
